Diagnosis. A smaLL spECIEs wITH TypICaL
Dicharax
- TypE rIbs ON R2 aNd sIGNIfICaNTLy THICkENEd pErIsTOmE.

Description of the holotype .
SHELL ( FIGUrE 31A ) LIGHT GrEy; sHELL OUTLINE OvaL frOm dOrsaL vIEw, bOdy wHOrL rOUNdEd; prOTOCONCH LOw, CONsIsTING Of aLmOsT 1.5 wHOrLs; R1 CONsIsTs Of 1.75 wHOrLs, GLOssy wITH rEGULar, dENsE rIbs, wHICH GradUaLLy TraNsfOrm TO aN IrrEGULarLy rIbbEd sECTION HavING wIdELy spaCEd rIbs aT ENd Of R1; rIbs LOw aNd bLUNT ON wHOLE sHELL; TraNsITION bETwEEN R1 aNd R2 vEry CLEarLy vIsIbLE; R2 vEry dENsELy rIbbEd; rIbs CUrvEd TOwards apErTUrE; COmbINEd LENGTH Of R2 + R3 Is apprOxImaTELy 100–110 dEGrEEs; R3 sLIGHTLy LONGEr THaN R2; TraNsITION bETwEEN R2 aNd R3 rELaTIvELy CLEarLy vIsIbLE dUE TO THE dIsappEaraNCE Of THE rIbs Of R3; CONsTrICTION bETwEEN R2 aNd R3 sHaLLOw; R3 smOOTH, GLOssy, wITH sOmE wIdELy-spaCEd GrOwTH LINEs ON THE TErmINaL parT; apErTUrE sLIGHTLy TEardrOp-sHapEd; pErIsTOmE vEry THICk OvEraLL; bOUNdary bETwEEN TwO LIps barELy vIsIbLE; OUTEr LIp ExpaNdEd aNd sHarp IN dIrECTION Of UmbILICUs aNd basE Of sHELL, bUT OTHErwIsE raTHEr bLUNT. SEE rEmarks rEGardING THE fINE mOrpHOLOGy Of R2 rIbs.
Measurements (in mm). D = 2.9–4.8, H = 1.7–2.8 (N = 20, sHELLs frOm mULTIpLE sampLEs), sEE aLsO TabLE 2 .

Operculum. THE OpErCULUm Of THE HOLOTypE Has a rEddIsH brOwN, LOw, mULTIspIraL LamELLa ON THE OUTEr sUrfaCE. THE OUTEr sUrfaCE Of THE OpErCULUm Of THE 2012/62 spECImEN Had NO LamELLa, ONLy THE mULTIspIraL sTrUCTUrE COULd bE sEEN. THE INNEr sUrfaCE Of sampLE 20080510B was ExamINEd; IT Is CONCavE, wITH aN ELEvaTEd CENTraL NIppLE.
Anatomy. ONE maLE spECImEN was aNaTOmICaLLy ExamINEd (20080510B, COLL . JUO, FIGUrEs 12E–F ). THE pENIs Is LarGE aNd rECTaNGULar, sLIGHTLy LONGEr aNd mUCH THICkEr THaN THE rIGHT TENTaCLE.

Radula. THE radULa Of ONE spECImEN was ExamINEd (samE spECImEN THaT was aNaTOmICaLLy ExamINEd). THE TEETH arE vEry sImILar TO THOsE Of
Dicharax alticola
n. sp.
, bUT aLL CUsps arE mOrE ELONGaTEd, mOrE sLENdEr aNd mOrE sHarpLy pOINTEd ( FIGUrE 13D ).

Variation in specimens. POpULaTIONs Of
Dicharax depressus
sHOw CONsIdErabLE varIabILITy IN TErms Of sHELL sIzE, sCULpTUrE Of R1 (smOOTH TO rEGULarLy, sTrONGLy rIbbEd) aNd THE sHapE Of THE bOdy wHOrL (rOUNdEd TO bLUNTLy kEELEd). TabLE 2 COmpILEs THE varIabLE TraITs aNd THEIr CHaraCTEr sTaTEs IN ExamINEd pOpULaTIONs.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Differential diagnosis.
Metalycaeus latecostatus Is
sOmEwHaT sImILar TO THE kEELEd aNd rIbbEd pOpULaTIONs Of
D. depressus
.
Metalycaeus latecostatus
, HOwEvEr, Has aN ELEvaTEd prOTOCONCH wITH spIraL sTrIaE. SOmE
Dicharax depressus
pOpULaTIONs arE sympaTrIC wITH sOmE aTypICaL LOOkING
D. cristatus
pOpULaTIONs. THEy CaN bE dIsTINGUIsHEd by THE sHELL sIzE (
D. depressus Is
smaLLEr), THE apErTUrE THICkNEss (THICkEr IN
D. depressus
) aNd THE pOsITION Of THE swELLING ON R3 (sITUaTEd CLOsEr TO THE apErTUrE IN
D. cristatus
).
Dicharax fimbriatus
CaN bE dIsTINGUIsHEd frOm
D. depressus
by THE CrENULaTEd pErIsTOmE.
Dicharax depressus Has
a THICkEr pErIsTOmE aNd LarGEr sHELL THaN
D. diminutus
.

THE MaLaysIaN
Dicharax diplochilus ( MöLLENdOrff, 1887 )
(ExamINEd sampLE: MaLakka, BUkIT PONdONG, PErak, COLL. MöLLENdOrff, SMF 109476, LECTOTypE) Is sImILar TO
D. depressus
IN GENEraL sHELL sHapE. THE mOsT CONspICUOUs dIffErENCE bETwEEN THE TwO spECIEs arE THE LENGTH Of R2 (sHOrT IN
diplochilus
aNd mOdEraTELy LONG IN
depressus
), aNd THE fOrmaTION Of THE pErIsTOmE. NamELy, IN
D. depressus
THE INNEr LIp Is prOmINENT, THICkENEd aNd prOTrUdING, aNd THE OUTEr LIp Is ExpaNdEd, raTHEr bLUNT, wHErEas IN
D. diplochilus
THE INNEr LIp Is NOT CONspICUOUs, rENdErING THE sHarp OUTEr LIp Is dOmINaNT. MaLaysIaN
Dicharax oligopleuris ( MöLLENdOrff, 1887 )
(ExamINEd sampLE: MaLakka, PErak, SMF 109226, LECTOTypE aNd SMF 109227, paraLECTOTypEs) Is mUCH smaLLEr THaN
D. depressus
, aNd aLsO Has sHOrTEr R2.

Distribution.
Dicharax depressus Is
rEpOrTEd frOm NOrTHErN VIETNam ( LaO CaI ,
SON La
, THaNH HOa ,
NGHE AN
prOvINCEs) aNd NOrTHErN LaOs ( LUaNG PrabaNG , PHONGsaLI aNd
XIENG KHOUaNG
prOvINCEs) ( FIGUrE 32 ).

Remarks. THE CrOss sECTIONaL vIEw Of R2 was ExamINEd IN ONE spECImEN ( MAA 1, FIGUrEs 28G–H ): aNTErIOr CrUsT fOrms a sIGNIfICaNTLy ELEvaTEd, HOLLOw rIb, wHICH Has a sTrONGEr aNTErIOr aNd wEakEr pOsTErIOr prOjECTION; aNTErIOr CrUsT fOLds sTrONGLy OvEr THE mUCH wEakEr pOsTErIOr CrUsT; pOsTErIOr CrUsT THICk, IT Is aLsO OCCasIONaLLy HOLLOw; CrOss sECTIONaL vIEw Of THE mICrOTUNNEL Is dEfOrmEd TEardrOp-sHapEd.

Dicharax depressus Has
bEEN dEsCrIbEd frOm PaC KHa, NOrTHErN VIETNam, wHICH Is sITUaTEd NEar THE bOrdEr wITH YUNNaN, CHINa. SHELLs Of a NEwLy COLLECTEd pOpULaTION IN THaN HOa PrOvINCE (CH1; apprOx. 250 km frOm THE TypE LOCaLITy), aNd NGHE AN PrOvINCE (20080510B; apprOx. 390 km frOm THE TypE LOCaLITy) arE NEarLy IdENTICaL wITH THE HOLOTypE Of
D. depressus
. SOmE sampLEs COLLECTEd IN THE VIETNamEsE SON La prOvINCE HavE a raTHEr kEELEd bOdy wHOrL (EspECIaLLy frOm apErTUraL vIEw) aNd HavE vEry sTrONG rIbs ON R1 ( FIGUrE 31C ). THEsE kEELEd pOpULaTIONs arE LOCaTEd bETwEEN smOOTH sHELLEd pOpULaTIONs. THErEfOrE, wE aTTaCH NO sUbGENErIC dIffErENTIaTION Of THE rIbbEd aNd kEELEd vErsUs THE smOOTH aNd rOUNdEd sHELLEd pOpULaTIONs.

THE spECImEN frOm pOpULaTION 2012/62 Has sOmE spIraL sTrIaTION ON R1, wHICH Has NOT bEEN dETECTEd IN aNy OTHEr
Dicharax
sampLEs. THIs spIraL sTrIaTION Is LOw aNd mIGHT NOT bE HOmOLOGOUs wITH THE mOrE ELEvaTEd spIraL sTrIaE Of THE GENUs
Metalycaeus
.
